:allowDrop.description: Whether to allow dragging and dropping on the node
:allowDrop.description_zh: 是否允许拖拽时放置在该节点

autoExpandParent.description: Whether to automatically expand the parent node

blockNode.description: Whether the node occupies a row

checkable.description_zh: 节点前添加 Checkbox 复选框

v-model:checkedKeys.description: (controlled) the tree node with the checkbox selected (Note: the parent node is associated, if the parent node key is passed, the child node is automatically selected; The key of the corresponding child node is passed in, and the parent node is automatically selected. When checkable and checkStrictly are set, it is an object with checked and halfchecked attributes, and the selection or absence of the parent node is no longer associated
v-model:checkedKeys.type: string\[] | number\[] | {checked: string\[] | number\[], halfChecked: string\[] | number\[]}
v-model:checkedKeys.description_zh: （受控）选中复选框的树节点（注意：父子节点有关联，如果传入父节点 key，则子节点自动选中；相应当子节点 key 都传入，父节点也自动选中。当设置`checkable`和`checkStrictly`，它是一个有`checked`和`halfChecked`属性的对象，并且父子节点的选中与否不再关联

checkStrictly.description: Node selection is fully controlled in the checkable state (the selected state of the parent and child nodes is no longer associated)
checkStrictly.description_zh: checkable 状态下节点选择完全受控（父子节点选中状态不再关联）

defaultExpandAll.description: By default, all tree nodes are expanded, if it is asynchronous data, it needs to be instantiated after the data is returned, it is recommended to use v-if="data.length"; When expandedKeys are present, defaultExpandAll will be invalidated
defaultExpandAll.description_zh: 默认展开所有树节点, 如果是异步数据，需要在数据返回后再实例化，建议用 v-if="data.length"；当有 expandedKeys 时，defaultExpandAll 将失效

draggable.description: Nodes can be dragged and dropped

:fieldNames.description: Replace the title, key, and children fields in treeNode with the corresponding fields in treeData
:fieldNames.description_zh: 替换 treeNode 中 title,key,children 字段为 treeData 中对应的字段

:filterTreeNode.description: Filter tree nodes (highlighted) as needed and return true
:filterTreeNode.description_zh: 按需筛选树节点（高亮），返回 true

:height.description: Set the height of the virtual scrolling container, after which the internal nodes no longer support horizontal scrolling
:height.description_zh: 设置虚拟滚动容器高度，设置后内部节点不再支持横向滚动

:loadedKeys.description: (controlled) nodes that have already been loaded, and need to be used with 'loadData'
:loadedKeys.description_zh: （受控）已经加载的节点，需要配合 `loadData` 使用

multiple.description: Support for clicking on multiple nodes (node itself)
multiple.description_zh: 支持点选多个节点（节点本身）

showIcon.description: There is no default style for displaying the icon before the TreeNode title, if it is set to true, you need to define the icon related style
showIcon.description_zh: 是否展示 TreeNode title 前的图标，没有默认样式，如设置为 true，需要自行定义图标相关样式

showLine.description: Whether or not to display the connection line

:switcherIcon.description: Customize the expand/collapse icon for the tree node
:switcherIcon.type: v-slot:switcherIcon="{active, checked, expanded, loading, selected, halfChecked, title, key, children, dataRef, data, defaultIcon, switcherCls}"
:switcherIcon.description_zh: 自定义树节点的展开/折叠图标

:treeData.description: treeNodes data, if set then you don't need to manually construct a TreeNode node (the key is unique across the tree)
:treeData.description_zh: treeNodes 数据，如果设置则不需要手动构造 TreeNode 节点（key 在整个树范围内唯一）

virtual.description: Turn off virtual scrolling when set to false
virtual.description_zh: 设置 false 时关闭虚拟滚动

events.name: check
events.params: function(checkedKeys, e:{checked: bool, checkedNodes, node, event})

events.name: expand
events.description: Triggered when a node is expanded/collapsed

events.name: load
events.description: Triggered when the node is loaded

events.name: select
events.description: Click on the tree node to trigger
events.params: function(selectedKeys, e:{selected: bool, selectedNodes, node, event})

TreeNode.name: checkable
TreeNode.description: 当树为 checkable 时，设置独立节点是否展示 Checkbox

TreeNode.name: icon
TreeNode.description: 自定义图标。可接收组件，props 为当前节点 props

TreeNode.name: isLeaf
TreeNode.description: 设置为叶子节点(设置了`loadData`时有效)

TreeNode.name: key
TreeNode.description: 被树的 (default)ExpandedKeys | (default)CheckedKeys | (default)SelectedKeys 属性所用。注意：整个树范围内的所有节点的 key 值不能重复！
TreeNode.default: 内部计算出的节点位置

TreeNode.name: selectable
TreeNode.description: 设置节点是否可被选中
